data: [{"id":"40284cc0-daf6-458c-b74e-39d1437d5c05","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: equal","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"240995f4-bec0-4800-a0a3-554564cbed3f","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description\n","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"equal","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function is a state-comparison utility used by the iterative analysis process in ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"analyze_allfunction","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". It checks whether the set of internal modules discovered by the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"module_manager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is identical to the set recorded in a previous iteration. If the sets match, it indicates that no new modules or dependencies were uncovered during the last pass of the analysis.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d6a83fed-3f2e-4a68-8ab4-757a9b5067bc","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Why this matters\n","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Static analysis tools often rely on \"fixed-point\" logic. Since analyzing one function might reveal a previously unknown import, the tool needs a way to know when its work is truly finished.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"554e9e00-34ae-4b35-979c-97bb525e013c","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Termination:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" This function provides the \"stop\" condition. Without it, the analyzer might stop too early (missing deep dependencies) or loop forever.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5c1738e7-9f3f-4fc0-b6b3-18bedaf15a71","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Completeness:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" By returning ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"True","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" only when the module list stabilizes, it ensures that every reachable part of the project has been analyzed before the process concludes.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ce7e8990-14a6-4b0a-aa4c-1284d5febd5a","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"How it Check:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" If the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"prev","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" state (the record from the last iteration) is empty, it returns ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"False","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", ensuring the analysis loop runs at least once.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"31bbee8e-8118-417c-8490-222c2cdd1581","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Set The analysis loop continues to ensure ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"auth","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is processed.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7872ccf9-a9da-46d9-b79c-2a5de6bf008b","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Iteration 3:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" No new imports are found in ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"auth","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"cf6aa04f-bb3e-4a27-bd7b-443c212ba972","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Check:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Both sets are now ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"{ 'main', 'utils', 'auth' }","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"bd9f99b2-6b24-4af5-9d22-3645b66ae522","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Result:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"True","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".
